summary: This is a ancient Roman style shield based on the typical shield a legionary would carry.

I recommend using "Armory of the Legion" instead of this mod because it contains all my work so far.The re-placer version of this mod can still be used in combination with Armory of the Legion.[/size][/i]

This is my first mod for Skyrim. I'm new to modding so any constructive feedback is appreciated.

This mod adds a new shield to Skyrim. The shield design is based on the shields used by the Legionaries (the heavy infantry backbone) of the ancient Roman legions. The size of this beast allows you to effectively block missiles while you move in for the melee and strike down your opponent with your Gladius (or any other weapon of choice).

Don't like big shields? A smaller Roman Auxiliary shield can be found [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58746/?]here[/url].

//INSTALLING//

The shield comes in two versions.

Standard - Replaces the imperial shield. Use this if you want imperials to carry the shield.
Non Replacer - Adds a new shield named "Legionary Shield". Craftable in the "Iron" section. I recommend this version for your character.

Both versions can be installed at the same time. When installing the second one if the program asks if you want to overwrite chose any option (It won't make a difference).

//TOOLS USED//

3ds Max 2012
Photoshop CS6
Nifskope
